Paragraph: Five phenotypic characteristics - - locomotor activity , righting ability , clonic seizure induction , stress - induced lethality , death without external stress - - were scored at various caffeine doses in drug - naive animals under empirically optimized , rigidly constant experimental conditions .

5. Therefore, the "Disease" entities in the paragraph are:
 * Clonic seizure induction
 * Stress-induced lethality
 * Death without external stress
